title: Tour de France 2021 Standings after Stage 8
content:
General Classification / Yellow Jersey

Tadej Pogačar (UAE Team Emirates) obliterated his GC rivals on stage 8 to climb into the yellow jersey. He now has a hude advantage at the head of the race with Wout van Aert (Jumbo-Visma) the only rider within four minutes. Alexey Lutsenko (Astana Premier-Tech) has outperformed expectations at the Tour de France, he's currently third.

His teammate Primož Roglič (Jumbo-Visma) was dropped from the peloton for the second consecutive stage, and has fallen out of overall contention. 

1. Tadej Pogačar
2. Wout van Aert +1:48
3. Alexey Lutsenko +4:38
4. Rigoberto Uran +4:46
5. Jonas Vingegaard +5:00
6. Richard Carapaz +5:01
7. Wilco Kelderman +5:13
8. Enric Mas +5:15
9. David Gaudu +5:52
10. Pello Bilbao +6:41

Tour de France 2021 Guide

Points Classification / Green Jersey

Michael Matthews snuck into the stage 8 breakaway early on to claim the standings in the green jersey competition. Nonetheless, Mark Cavendish still holds a demanding lead at the top of the classification.

1. Mark Cavendish - 168 points
2. Michael Matthews - 113 points
3. Mathieu van der Poel - 103 points
4. Jasper Philipsen - 102 points
5. Nacer Bouhanni - 99 points

King of the Mountains Classification / Polka-Dot Jersey

Wout Poels targeted the polka-dot jersey early on stage 8 which allowed him to take the jersey from his teammate Matej Mohorič. Mike Woods is second in the competition whilst Dylan Teuns is now third.

1. Wout Poels - 23 points
2. Michael Woods - 16 points
3. Dylan Teuns - 12 points
4. Matej Mohorič - 11 points
5. Tadej Pogačar - 10 points

Young Rider's Classification / White Jersey

Despite falling some places in the general classification, Tadej Pogačar retains his lead in the young rider's classification. After UAE Team Emirates made some tactical errors today, Pogačar will likely try and win back some time on his rivals in tomorrow's mountain stage.

1. Tadej Pogačar
2. Jonas Vingegaard +5:00
3. David Gaudu +5:52
4. Aurélien Paret-Peintre +7:33
5. Lucas Hamilton +31:48

Team Classification

1. Bahrain Victorious
2. Astana - Premier Tech +15:34
3. Jumbo-Visma +18:27
4. AG2R Citroën +25:12
5. Ineos Grenadiers +28:49
